summary: Comprehensive testing completed for enhanced multiplayer Tic-Tac-Toe with all critical fixes verified. Backend APIs (22/22) working perfectly. All previously reported critical issues have been successfully resolved: game cells are now clickable, /api/games/waiting endpoint fixed, and all new features (game codes, player search, animations) working excellently.
passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (22/22 passed) - all game code and search endpoints working
CRITICAL FIX VERIFIED: Game cells are now clickable and gameplay works perfectly
X and O markers appear with beautiful spring animations using framer-motion
Winning line highlights with glow animation (.winning-cell-x class working)
Game codes are generated (6-character alphanumeric like 'PREKJ5')
Game code display in header with copy functionality
Game code sharing notification system working
Join by code functionality with 6-character input validation
Player search works with debounced input and API integration
Stats page with animated cards showing player statistics
History page with match history and animations
Navigation between all pages (Home, Stats, History, Game, Lobby)
Online Multiplayer lobby with Create New Game functionality
WebSocket connectivity showing 'Connected' status
Animated game board with gradient border glow effect
Player names and turn indicators with neon glow effects
Responsive design and modern UI with framer-motion animations
Game state management (waiting for opponent, in progress, completed)
Local 2-Player mode with alternating turns
Winner announcement and game completion handling
Rematch functionality and game replay features
